channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Times Internet spin-out Abound raises $14M to let more Indian Americans send money home
item.description: Abound, a go-to remittance app that was spun off by India's Times Internet, has raised $14 million in a seed round.

item.title: Vivaldi Browser Now Comes With Proton VPN for Free
item.description: Our favorite VPN service is now integrated into our favorite web browser.

item.title: NHS vendor Advanced to pay £3M fine following 2022 ransomware attack
item.description: NHS vendor Advanced will pay just over £3 million ($3.8 million) in fines for not implementing basic security measures before it suffered a ransomware...

item.title: I Opted Out of AI Training. Does This Reduce My Future Influence?
item.description: WIRED’s advice columnist considers whether trying to remove your data and information from generative AI tools could lessen your impact on the technol...

item.title: OpenAI will reportedly close its SoftBank-led $40 billion round soon
item.description: While you’re busy Ghibli-fying your images with ChatGPT’s new image-generation capabilities, OpenAI is out raising a ton more cash. The company is clo...

item.title: Inside arXiv—the Most Transformative Platform in All of Science
item.description: Modern science wouldn’t exist without the online research repository known as arXiv. Three decades in, its creator still can’t let it go.

item.title: Therabody Promo Codes: 10% Off | March 2025
item.description: Save on the science-backed devices you’ve been eyeing with a 10% off Theragun discount code, and March 2025 offers at up to 30% off.

item.title: OpenAI’s viral Studio Ghibli moment highlights AI copyright concerns
item.description: It’s only been a day since ChatGPT’s new AI image generator went live, and social media feeds are already flooded with AI-generated memes in the style...

item.title: Hikaru Utada Would Rather Play CERN Than Coachella
item.description: The Japanese singer-songwriter’s new album goes deep on their “fascination with science.” WIRED Japan took Hikaru Utada to visit the Large Hadron Coll...

item.title: Nvidia is reportedly in talks to acquire Lepton AI
item.description: Nvidia is looking to get into the server rental market. The semiconductor giant is reportedly nearing a deal to acquire Lepton AI, a company that rent...
